anchorStateRoot(uint256,bytes32).details: Function requires:         - Only coconsensus contract address can call this function.

params._blockNumber: Block number for which state root needs to                     update.
params._stateRoot: State root of input block number.

getLatestStateRootBlockNumber().return: uint256 Block number of the latest anchored state root.

params._blockNumber: The block number for which the state root is needed.

getStateRoot(uint256).return: bytes32 State root of the given number.

setup().details: This can be called by anyone only once. The check in StateRootProvider::setup     ensures this in its circular buffer setup. Another check is provided by     StateRootProvider::anchorStateRootInternal can be only called once for a given block     number and has to be increasing.

anchorStateRoot(uint256,bytes32).notice: Anchor the state root for an (increasing) block number.

getLatestStateRootBlockNumber().notice: Gets the block number of latest anchored state root.

getStateRoot(uint256).notice: Get the state root for the given block number.

setup().notice: Setup function for origin observer contract.
